name: Krampus
description: You play as a teenager, who along with his family went to a country house to celebrate Christmas. But in the festive night something went wrong.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 - Attention: Windows 8,10 may contain errors Processor: Pentium® 4 2,0 ГГц or Athlon® XP 2,0 ГГц Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 6200 or ATI Radeon 9600 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 - Attention: Windows 8,10 may contain errors Processor: Pentium® 4 2,0 ГГц or Athlon® XP 2,0 ГГц Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 8600 или ATI Radeon HD series DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible

reviews.review_text: Not very good. No way to 'win' really. Only one ending as far as I could tell. Not very scary. No replay value I could see. So much more could be done with this concept. I wanted to like it. I guess what was going on in Mommy's bedroom finished off what was left of your sanity.
